critique: The document is a formal executive order regarding the implementation of section 5520a of title 5, United States Code. The tone is formal and legalistic. The primary goal is to direct the Office of Personnel Management and the Postmaster General to create regulations. There is no explicit emotional appeal. The implied emotions are related to ensuring proper implementation of the law. Initial scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1. Revised scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1.
